name: Home Page
heroTitle: But God demonstrates His own love toward us, in that while we were still sinners, Christ died for us.
heroText: We are a group of Christians who simply gather in the name of the Lord Jesus Christ. Come and hear about the Jesus of the Bible.

name: About Us
heroText: We are a company of Christians from many backgrounds, cultures, nationalities and many walks of life with one essential theme in common â€” we have all come to know God's Son, the Lord Jesus Christ, as our own personal Saviour and Lord.

name: Ministries
heroText: At Mitchell Christian Assembly we believe in making a difference for Christ through gospel meetings, Bible studies, and Sunday School.

name: Events

name: Contact
